distance_from_table.probleme: Standing too close or too far from the table
causes_communes: Jamming, rushed strokes, loss of power and control

debutant: Start rallies about arm's length from the table

exercices_complementaires.description: Keep a consistent distance from the table, adapting to different shot types.

metriques_progression: Start at arm's length and adjust as needed
erreurs_a_eviter: Backing up too easily, giving the opponent time to react
Not using the full forehand hitting zone
